snippet: The Los Angeles County sheriff, Lee Baca, has agreed in principle to a host of sweeping changes in the way the Los Angeles County jail system, the largest in the country, will be run.
abstract: Los Angeles County Sheriff Lee Baca agrees in principle to host of sweeping changes in way the county's jail system will be run; announcement comes days after a commission issued a report lambasting culture of violence, excessive force and lax oversight in county's jails.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles County sheriff, Lee Baca, has agreed in principle to a host of sweeping changes in the way the Los Angeles County jail system, the largest in the country, will be run.

headline.main: California: Sheriff Agrees to Jail Reforms
headline.print_headline: California: Sheriff Agrees To Jail Reforms
